content: District located in Singapore The **Civic District** is a district located near the [Singapore River](/wiki/Singapore_River) in the [Central Area](/wiki/Central_Area,_Singapore) of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It contains historical buildings and museums such as [The Arts House](/wiki/The_Arts_House) (the former Parliament House), [National Gallery Singapore](/wiki/National_Gallery_Singapore) (consisting of the [Former Supreme Court Building](/wiki/Former_Supreme_Court,_Singapore) and [Former City Hall](/wiki/Former_City_Hall,_Singapore)), [National Museum of Singapore](/wiki/National_Museum_of_Singapore) (the former Raffles Library and Museum), and [Asian Civilisations Museum](/wiki/Asian_Civilisations_Museum) (the former [Empress Place Building](/wiki/Empress_Place_Building)). It also includes the [memorial](/wiki/Memorial) such as the [Civilian War Memorial](/wiki/Civilian_War_Memorial), [Lim Bo Seng Memorial](/wiki/Lim_Bo_Seng_Memorial) and [The Cenotaph](/wiki/The_Cenotaph,_Singapore). Other institutions within the district includes [Parliament House](/wiki/Parliament_House,_Singapore), [Esplanade](/wiki/Esplanade,_Singapore), [Fort Canning](/wiki/Fort_Canning), [Supreme Court Building](/wiki/Supreme_Court_of_Singapore), [Raffles City](/wiki/Raffles_City_Singapore), and the [City Hall MRT station](/wiki/City_Hall_MRT_station). This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Civic District
